## 🛍️ Shopify MCP: get-products

**Use Case**: Retrieve all products or search by title.
**Invocation**: `Get all products` or `Find product by title: "Canvas Print"`
**Expected Output**: JSON list of product objects with variants, titles, images, inventory.
**Tool Type**: `executeTool` with `toolName: get-products`

## 👤 Shopify MCP: get-customers

**Use Case**: Retrieve customer profiles (paginate or filter).
**Invocation**: `Get all customers` or `Find customer by email: john@example.com`
**Expected Output**: Array of customer objects including email, tags, order history.
**Tool Type**: `executeTool` with `toolName: get-customers`

## 🧾 Shopify MCP: get-orders

**Use Case**: Fetch order data with filtering (by date, status).
**Invocation**: `Get all orders last week` or `Find orders by customer ID`
**Expected Output**: JSON list of order objects with line items, totals, status.
**Tool Type**: `executeTool` with `toolName: get-orders`

## ✏️ Shopify MCP: update-theme-asset

**Use Case**: Change a specific theme file (e.g. update CSS, replace homepage banner).
**Invocation**: `Update theme asset: sections/home-banner.liquid`
**Input**: Asset key + content to replace
**Output**: Confirmation of successful update

## 🏷️ Shopify MCP: tag-customer

**Use Case**: Add tags (e.g., VIP, influencer) to a customer profile
**Invocation**: `Tag customer john@example.com as VIP`
**Input**: Customer ID or email, tag(s)
**Output**: Success/failure confirmation

## 💸 Shopify MCP: create-discount

**Use Case**: Generate discount codes (percent/fixed type)
**Invocation**: `Create 20% off Black Friday code`
**Input**: Discount type, value, duration
**Output**: New discount code details

## 📄 Shopify MCP: create-page

**Use Case**: Publish a new marketing or product info page
**Invocation**: `Create new landing page: Holiday Collection`
**Input**: Title, HTML content
**Output**: Page ID and URL confirmation

## 🧠 Shopify MCP Tool Introspection

**Tool**: `listTools`
**Use Case**: Returns all available tools from the Shopify MCP Server.
**Invocation**: `List all available Shopify tools`
**Output**: JSON array of tool names and descriptions.
